org.lenskit.data.ratings

Class RatingBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lenskit.data.ratings.RatingBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<Rating>, EventBuilder<Rating>

    @DefaultFields(value={"userId","itemId","rating","timestamp?"})
public class RatingBuilder
extends Object
implements EventBuilder<Rating>, org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<Rating>, Cloneable

    Build a Rating.

    Since:
    1.3

      • copy

        public static RatingBuilder copy(Rating r)

        Construct a new rating builder that is a copy of a particular rating.

        Parameters:
        r - The rating to copy.
        Returns:
        A rating builder that will initially build a copy of the specified rating.

      • setRating

        public RatingBuilder setRating(double r)

        Set the rating value.

        In order to prevent computation errors from producing unintended unrate events, this method cannot be used to create an unrate event. Instead, use clearRating().

        Parameters:
        r - The rating value.
        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • clearRating

        public RatingBuilder clearRating()

        Clear the rating value (so this builder builds unrate events).

        Returns:
        The builder (for chaining).

      • hasRating

        public boolean hasRating()

        Query whether this builder has a rating.

        Returns:
        true if the builder has a rating, false if it will produce unrate events.

        Returns:

      • build

        public Rating build()
        Description copied from interface: EventBuilder

        Builds the event. Built event objects are entirely independent of the event builder; the setters can be used to build a new event after this builder has built one event.

        Specified by:
        build in interface org.apache.commons.lang3.builder.Builder<Rating>
        Specified by:
        build in interface EventBuilder<Rating>
        Returns:
        A new event.

      • clone

        public RatingBuilder clone()
        Description copied from interface: EventBuilder

        Clone this event builder. Useful to use an event builder in different threads.

        Specified by:
        clone in interface EventBuilder<Rating>
        Overrides:

        Returns:
